languages.text: {n}Движение друкари едва фиксируется взглядом: Маражай небрежным взмахом выбивает устройство из вашей руки. Таинственный артефакт улетает в темноту и, судя по стуку и звону, проваливается в какую-то щель. Ксенос обращает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Никакая побрякушка не будет состязаться со мной за твои помыслы".

{n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."
languages.original_text: {n}Движение друкари едва фиксируется взглядом: Маражай небрежным взмахом выбивает устройство из вашей руки. Таинственный артефакт улетает в темноту и, судя по стуку и звону, проваливается в какую-то щель. Ксенос обращает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Никакая побрякушка не будет состязаться со мной за твои помыслы".

The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋以肉眼几乎无法察觉的动作，漫不经心地挥了挥手，将那个装置从你手中拍飞。神秘的造物飞入了黑暗之中，随后发出了咔嗒声，应该是掉到某个裂隙之中了。玛拉斋把目光转向了你。{/n}“不行，{name}。我绝不允许任何饰品夺走属于我的关注。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋以肉眼几乎无法察觉的动作，漫不经心地挥了挥手，将那个装置从你手中拍飞。神秘的造物飞入了黑暗之中，随后发出了咔嗒声，应该是掉到某个裂隙之中了。玛拉斋把目光转向了你。{/n}“不行，{name}。我绝不允许任何饰品夺走属于我的关注。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの動きはあまりに速く、目には見えなかった。マラズハイは投げやりにあなたの手から装置を叩き落とす。謎めいたアーティファクトは暗闇へ飛んでいき、ガタガタという音から判断するに、どこかの隙間に落ちていったのだろう。異種族が視線をあなたに移す。{/n}「いいや、{name}。どんな装身具であっても、俺以上にお前の関心を惹けるものはないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの動きはあまりに速く、目には見えなかった。マラズハイは投げやりにあなたの手から装置を叩き落とす。謎めいたアーティファクトは暗闇へ飛んでいき、ガタガタという音から判断するに、どこかの隙間に落ちていったのだろう。異種族が視線をあなたに移す。{/n}「いいや、{name}。どんな装身具であっても、俺以上にお前の関心を惹けるものはないだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le geste du Drukhari est si vif que vous avez à peine le temps de le voir. Marazhai fait voler l'appareil hors de vos mains avec un coup mécanique. L'artefact mystérieux est projeté dans les ténèbres et, d'après le bruit qu'il produit, tombe dans une crevasse. Le xénos se tourne alors vers vous.{/n} « Non, {name}. Aucune babiole ne me privera de votre attention. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le geste du Drukhari est si vif que vous avez à peine le temps de le voir. Marazhai fait voler l'appareil hors de vos mains avec un coup mécanique. L'artefact mystérieux est projeté dans les ténèbres et, d'après le bruit qu'il produit, tombe dans une crevasse. Le xénos se tourne alors vers vous.{/n} « Non, {name}. Aucune babiole ne me privera de votre attention. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari se mueve demasiado rápido como para seguirlo con la mirada. Marazhai te quita el dispositivo de la mano con un rápido golpe. El misterioso artefacto sale volando hacia la oscuridad y, a juzgar por el estrépito, se introduce en alguna grieta. El xenos dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «No, {name}. Ningún dispositivo competirá conmigo para atraer tu atención».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari se mueve demasiado rápido como para seguirlo con la mirada. Marazhai te quita el dispositivo de la mano con un rápido golpe. El misterioso artefacto sale volando hacia la oscuridad y, a juzgar por el estrépito, se introduce en alguna grieta. El xenos dirige su mirada hacia ti.{/n} «No, {name}. Ningún dispositivo competirá conmigo para atraer tu atención».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari bewegt sich so schnell, dass das Auge es kaum wahrnehmen kann. Mit einem nachlässigen Hieb schlägt Marazhai dir das Gerät aus der Hand. Das mysteriöse Artefakt fliegt in die Dunkelheit und den Geräuschen nach zu urteilen durch irgendeine Spalte. Der Xenos blickt dich an.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Kein Objekt wird jemals mit mir um Eure Aufmerksamkeit buhlen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari bewegt sich so schnell, dass das Auge es kaum wahrnehmen kann. Mit einem nachlässigen Hieb schlägt Marazhai dir das Gerät aus der Hand. Das mysteriöse Artefakt fliegt in die Dunkelheit und den Geräuschen nach zu urteilen durch irgendeine Spalte. Der Xenos blickt dich an.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Kein Objekt wird jemals mit mir um Eure Aufmerksamkeit buhlen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, neredeyse gözle görülmeyecek kadar hızlı. Marazhai, baştan savma tek bir hareketle elindeki cihaza vurup onu düşürmene sebep oluyor. Gizemli eser, karanlığa doğru fırlayıp gediğin tekinin içine düşüyor. Zeno, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Hayır {name}. İlgin için hiçbir ıvır zıvırla yarışacak değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's movement is almost too swift to be registered by the eye. Marazhai slaps the device out of your hand with a perfunctory swing. The mysterious artefact flies off into the darkness and, judging by the clatter, falls through some crevice. The xenos turns his gaze to you.{/n} "No, {name}. No trinket will ever compete with me for your attention."
